name: Long-Pulley, Narrow
how_to_perform:
1. Set up a long pulley machine with a narrow grip.
2. Hold the handles tightly and squeeze your shoulder muscles as you contract at the top of the movement.
3. Slowly release the tension in your arms and lower the weight back to the starting position, keeping your elbows close to your body throughout the exercise.
4. Keep your core engaged and maintain proper posture while performing the Long-Pulley, Narrow exercise.
short_summary: Long Pulley exercises are specifically designed for arm development, targeting multiple muscle groups with the narrow grip variation effectively engaging the lateral deltoids and triceps muscles.
